https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/installer/

1,下载好mysql
https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/installer/
下载地址
2,mysql安装配置
#错误1:出现密码check失败,



===============================================================
#错误1:出现密码check失败,
出现了 密码check失败,
方案1:退出安装,把之前的mysql安装彻底删除干净
https://blog.csdn.net/lvoyee/article/details/104030272
dos,regedit ,搜索,mysql,把带mysql的都删除掉
